cv.aboutme: Ohjelmointi on intohimoni, jokapäiväinen uuden oppiminen ja innostukseni ovat tekemiseni lähtökohta.

fulltime.sentence-1: I have hands-on experience in managing the deployment of applications to the Elastic Container Service (ECS) on AWS. My key responsibilities included ensuring the correct configurations for the applications, thereby ensuring their smooth functioning.
fulltime.sentence-2: I closely monitored the DevOps side of a few applications to make sure they were deployed successfully and without any technical glitches.
fulltime.sentence-3: I was also responsible for the successful migration of multiple React application's components to their own npm packages. This involved carefully analyzing the components and ensuring that they functioned properly after the migration. I also managed the versions of various npm packages to ensure that the applications were up-to-date and free from any technical issues.

internship.sentence-1: I was responsible for the refactoring of a large Express project to Typescript and updating an Angular project to the latest version.

parttime.sentence-1: I am responsible for developing and maintaining the Frontend interface of various projects.

home.sorry: Pahoittelut harmillisista kielioppivirheistä ja käännöksen puutteesta
